channel.title: ::jail
channel.description:

any 1 know ?

item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

[quote=“Bacus23, post:5, topic:175092”]first of all delete that teleblock…

and “c.teleport” delete c. so its just teleport on all of them…

then see[/quote]
Dude he needs the teleblock so the jailed people don’t tele out.

dont do what this guy says, use zeb’s code, it looks sound

Read full topic

item.title: ::jail
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

here take my ::jail command + ::unjail command:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3226; c.teleportToY = 3407; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3253;
c.teleportToY = 3431;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!.”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::jail
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 21 January 2008, 13:53:05[/size][hr]here it is :

[code]if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by Musicmad441
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2451;
c.teleportToY = 4938;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

else if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 3228;
c.teleportToY = 3408;
c.teleblock = false;
c.sendMessage(“Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!.”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]
